item.title: An Example Upgrade and Rollback of a Deployment image in Kubernetes
item.description: In this article, I’m going to show you how to bootstrap a local kubernetes cluster with a custom image, debug it, deploy a new image, then rollback to the old image.

item.title: How to Setup and Use Kubernetes in Docker [kind]
item.description: kind is a tool that spins up a kubernetes cluster of arbitrary size on your local machine. It is, in my experience, more lightweight than minikube, and also allows for a multi node setup.
